name: eqvreltr4d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c3))

comment: A transitivity relation for equivalences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
